# menu

**Instance Property**

Returns the responder’s menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var menu: NSMenu? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For `NSApplication` this menu is the same as the menu returned by its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/mainMenu] property.

## Related Documentation

- **defaultMenu**: Overridden by subclasses to return the default pop-up menu for instances of the receiving class.
- **menu(for:)**: Overridden by subclasses to return a context-sensitive pop-up menu for a given mouse-down event.
